titles.title: To approve a Governing International Fisheries Agreement.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Management.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries. H. Rept. 103-382.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 210.

bill.summary: 11/19/1993--Reported to House amended. Authorizes renewal, until May 1, 1994, of the Agreement between the Government of the United States and the Government of the Russian Federation on Mutual Fisheries Relations which expired on October 28, 1993. Amends the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act to extend, for three months, the prohibition on the implementation of certain measures that would reduce incidental mortality of nontarget fishery resources in the course of shrimp trawl fishing.
